nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.infotexts

Interface InfoTextServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InfoTextService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InfoTextServiceImpl

    public interface InfoTextServiceLocal
extends InfoTextService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

    • Method Detail

      • getInfoTextSubject

        java.lang.String getInfoTextSubject(java.lang.String alias)
        Gets the info text's subject associated with the alias parameter
        If the info text couldn't be found then returns the internationalized value for the key infoText.nomatch.subject.
        If the alias parameter is null then returns the internationalized value for the key infoText.empty.subject.
        Parameters:
        alias - the info texts's alias to search for
        Returns:
        the info text's subject according to the specified alias

      • loadByAliasForWebServices

        InfoText loadByAliasForWebServices(java.lang.String alias)
                                   throws EntityNotFoundException
        Loads an info text by alias without permission checks
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException

      • loadForWebServices

        InfoText loadForWebServices(long id)
                            throws EntityNotFoundException
        Loads an info text without permission checks
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException

      • searchForWebServices

        java.util.List<InfoText> searchForWebServices(InfoTextQuery query)
        Searches for matching info texts without permission checks
